title: Turn-on mode probe based on the sustainable xanthohumol extract for the efficient viscosity response in a liquid system
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17824-17831

Natural extract xanthohumol was utilized as a multi-functional molecular tool for viscosity tracking in the turn-on mode.
